links.*: The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar

wikitext.*:
'''Codemasters''' is a British video games developer and publisher.Since 2021, it belongs in [[Electronic Arts]]. They are the European publishers of ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar]]''.
